snippet: A United States court of appeals gave Argentina until March 29 to submit a plan for the repayment of $1.33 billion in debt that the country defaulted on 11 years ago.
abstract: United States court of appeals gives Argentina until March 29 to submit plan for repayment of $1.33 billion in debt that country defaulted on 11 years ago.
lead_paragraph: A United States court of appeals gave Argentina until March 29 to submit a plan for the repayment of $1.33 billion in debt that the country defaulted on 11 years ago.

headline.main: Argentina: U.S. Court Orders Debt Repayment Plan
headline.print_headline: Argentina: U.S. Court Orders Debt Repayment Plan
